mapper.select: select li.*, pp.ps_title, pp.ps_price, pp.ps_post_status, m.stream_key from live LI left join product_post pp on li.ps_index = pp.ps_index join member m on li.member_mid = m.mid where TO_CHAR(LIVE_START_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and TO_CHAR(LIVE_END_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and li.live_status = '1'

SELECT LI.*, PP.*, M.MNAME FROM LIVE LI JOIN PRODUCT_POST PP ON LI.PS_INDEX = PP.PS_INDEX JOIN MEMBER M ON LI.MEMBER_MID = M.MID WHERE TO_CHAR(LI.LIVE_START_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') > TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ORDER BY LI.LIVE_STARTDAY,LI.LIVE_START_TIME

/*LiveMapper.getLiveInfo*/ SELECT LI.MEMBER_MID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_STATUS ,to_char(LI.LIVE_STARTDAY, 'yy-mm-dd') AS LIVE_STARTDAY ,to_char(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, 'hh24:mi') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,to_char(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, 'hh24:mi') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,m.stream_key ,PP.PS_INDEX ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS FROM LIVE LI LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_POST PP ON li.ps_index = pp.ps_index join member m on li.member_mid = m.mid where PS_POST_STATUS = '판매중' and LIVE_ID = #{liveId}

SELECT LI.MEMBER_MID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,to_char(LI.LIVE_STARTDAY, 'yy-mm-dd') AS LIVE_STARTDAY ,to_char(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,m.stream_key ,PP.PS_INDEX ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,VI.VIDEO_NAME FROM LIVE LI LEFT JOIN VIDEO VI ON LI.VIDEO_ID = VI.VIDEO_ID JOIN PRODUCT_POST PP ON li.ps_index = pp.ps_index JOIN MEMBER M ON LI.MEMBER_MID = M.MID WHERE LIVE_ID = #{liveId} and PS_POST_STATUS = '판매중'
select pid, pname, price, img1 from product where pid in (select product_pid from product_post_add where ps_index = #{ps_index})

SELECT LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,to_char(LI.LIVE_STARTDAY, 'yy-mm-dd') AS LIVE_STARTDAY ,to_char(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,to_char(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,LI.LIVE_STATUS FROM LIVE LI WHERE LI.MEMBER_MID = #{mId} ORDER BY LIVE_STARTDAY DESC
select LI.*, VI.*, m.stream_key FROM LIVE LI LEFT JOIN VIDEO VI ON li.video_id = vi.video_id JOIN MEMBER M ON LI.MEMBER_MID = M.MID WHERE LI.LIVE_STATUS IN ('1','2') ORDER BY LIVE_END_TIME DESC
select LI.*, VI.*, m.stream_key FROM LIVE LI LEFT JOIN VIDEO VI ON li.video_id = vi.video_id JOIN MEMBER M ON LI.MEMBER_MID = M.MID WHERE LI.LIVE_STATUS IN ('1','2') ORDER BY LIVE_VIEW DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE LIVE SET VIDEO_ID = #{videoId}, LIVE_STATUS = 0 WHERE LIVE_ID = #{liveId}

UPDATE LIVE SET LIVE_STATUS = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LIVE_START_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= TO_CHAR(current_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND TO_CHAR(LIVE_END_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= TO_CHAR(current_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') THEN 1 WHEN TO_CHAR(LIVE_END_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < TO_CHAR(current_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') THEN 2 ELSE 0 END WHERE TO_CHAR(LIVE_STARTDAY,'yy-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(current_date,'yy-MM-DD') AND LIVE_STATUS IN (0,1)
